name: Night of Sin
description:
Night of Sin is a Sin w/ Me prequel fanfiction that takes place in an alternate universe. Inspired by the original visual novel romance game, Night of Sin has a prologue, 7 episodes, and an epilogue planned. 

Since the original Sin w/ Me game and APP it belonged to shutdown and closed, Night of Sin is a homage to the original, trying to keep the same spirit of the characters and character interactions.
